Dispute order cancellation
Opening a dispute should be a final option. You should always attempt to repair your bussiness relationship before opening a dispute.
Resolving a dispute is a lengthy process, affecting your Digiserved reputation.
Regardless of how bad a Buyer can be, there is usually room to negotiate. This is what distinguishes good Sellers from great Sellers.
Are you sure ou want to continue?
I tried my best to communicate with [Buyer] and deliver the order
[Buyer] 's requirements are unreasonable and I feel they are impossible to be satisfied
I understand that this dispute will negatively affect my Digiserved reputation
